MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-OCT-2020 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL54 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Waenfawr, Rhostryfan and the surrounding area. Our engineers have arrived on site and repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20AM on 31st  October 2020
